title: A Sign of Affection
overview: Yuki Itose is just a typical student dealing with the pressures of college. She is struggling one day on the train when an upperclassman named Itsuomi Nagi helps her out. As he gradually opens a new world to her, Yuki develops feelings for Itsuomi. A pure love story begins to grow.

tv.episodeOverview: Itsuomi and Yuki have a chat at his place, and several lingering questions are answered.
